TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit VisualState extends System.Windows.DependencyObject

summary.span: 表示特定状态下控件的可视外观。

span.span: Represents the visual appearance of the control when it is in a specific state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定控件在处于某种状态时的外观。A specifies how the control looks when it is in a certain state. 例如, 在按下时, 其边框可能不同于正常颜色。For example, when a is pressed, its border might be a different color than normal. 类具有一个属性, 该属性更改控件的外观。 The class has a property that changes the appearance of the control. 当控件输入属性指定的状态时, 将开始。When the control enters the state that is specified by the property, the begins. 当控件退出状态时, 将停止。When the control exits the state, the stops. 属性包含对象。The property contains objects. 对象将添加到在上定义的附加属性中。 objects are added to the attached property, which is defined on the on a . 您可以将对象添加到任何对象, 但这些对象通常用于的中。You can add objects to any , but they are typically are used in a of a . 有关如何为现有控件创建和对象的信息, 请参阅[通过创建 system.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For information about how to create a and objects for existing controls, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 有关使用之外的对象的示例, 请参阅类。For an example of using objects outside of a , see the class. ## Examples 下面的示例 在名`Pressed` `MouseOver` `Normal`为的中创建一个, 并为状态、、和添加对象。 `CommonStates`The following example creates a in the of a called `CommonStates` and adds objects for the states, `Normal`, `Pressed`, and `MouseOver`. 还定义了一个名`Disabled`为的状态, 在`CommonStates`中, 该示例为简洁起见省略了该状态。 The also defines a state called `Disabled` that is in the `CommonStates`, but the example omits it for brevity. 有关完整示例, 请参阅[通过创建 System.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For the entire example, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). [!code-xaml[VSMButtonTemplate#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/vsmbuttontemplate/csharp/buttonstages.xaml#10)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过将 的传递给,指定元素应输入的可视状态。You specify which visual state an element should enter by passing the of the to the . 当在中 使用时,控件作者应通过将置于其类签名上来指定控件希望在其中查找的对象。When a uses the in a , the control author should specify which objects the control expects to find in its by putting the on its class signature. 作者定义新的对象,并将属性设置为属性指定的值。 authors define new objects and set the property to the value specified by the property. 若要查找附带[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]的控件的可视状态的名称, 请参阅[控件样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-styles-and-templates.md)。To find the names of the visual states for the controls that are included with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], see [Control Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-styles-and-templates.md). 有关如何为现有控件创建和对象的信息, 请参阅[通过创建 system.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For information about how to create a and objects for existing controls, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下面的示例 在名`Pressed` `MouseOver` `Normal`为的中创建一个, 并为状态、、和添加对象。 `CommonStates`The following example creates a in the of a called `CommonStates` and adds objects for the states, `Normal`, `Pressed`, and `MouseOver`. 还定义了一个名`Disabled`为的状态, 在`CommonStates`中, 该示例为简洁起见省略了该状态。 The also defines a state called `Disabled` that is in the `CommonStates`, but the example omits it for brevity. 有关完整示例, 请参阅[通过创建 System.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For the entire example, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). summary.span: 获取或设置一个 ，它定义控件在 所表示的状态下的外观。

span.span: Gets or sets a that defines the appearance of the control when it is in the state that is represented by the .

value.span: 一个演示图板，它定义控件在 所表示的状态下的外观。

span.span: A storyboard that defines the appearance of the control when it is in the state that is represented by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件输入属性指定的状态时, 将开始。When the control enters the state that is specified by the property, the begins. 当控件退出状态时, 将停止。When the control exits the state, the stops. ## Examples 下面的示例为包含一个 的创建了一个简单的。The following example creates a simple for a that contains one . 如果用户`MouseOver`将鼠标放在上, 则调用的 演示图板会将的颜色从绿色更改为红色。 The called `MouseOver` has a Storyboard that changes the color of the from green to red when the user puts the mouse over the . 包括调用`Normal`的, 以便在用户将鼠标移出按钮时, 将返回到绿色。The called `Normal` is included so that when the user moves the mouse off the button, the returns to green.
